title: *10% off** FS: 48 T206 Sovereigns, with 460's and apple greens
author: Runscott

posts.post_title: *10% off** FS: 48 T206 Sovereigns, with 460's and apple greens
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping - Paypal gift, check or money order.  Scans are accurate, but any raw card can be returned for any reason.

Additional cards, including T205s (SGC, PSA and ungraded) can be found by left-clicking on my website links below.

Please contact using my email: T206TheMonster at gmail.com 

Left-click on icon or hot-link to see full-size card image.  I just noticed that some scans (e.g-Devlin) show bits of hair or fur that was apparently on my scanner.  I'll re-scan, but for now please note.

These and more at: [URL="http://t206themonster.com/T206-Cards2.html"]T206themonster.com - Sovereign Page[/URL]

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST206-312Mar2_op_800x710.jpg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/T206-Cards2~~element146~~7.jpg[/IMG][/URL] 
Rube Marquard - Sovereign 460 - $165.00

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST206-425Sey_op_800x710.jpg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/T206-Cards2~~element147~~6.jpg[/IMG][/URL] 
Seymour - Sovereign 460 - $95.00

[URL="http://t206themonster.com/Cards/FORSALE/ST206-414Sch2_op_800x710.jpg"][IMG]http://t206themonster.com/publishImages/T206-Cards2~~element147~~4.jpg[/IMG][/URL] 
Schlei - Sovereign 460 - $85.00

For now...

10% off prices posted on website (same as here for Sovereigns) - i.d. yourself as Net54 if using the website link to contact me.

As always, I'll process email requests first, then look at posts here and PM's.

I still have lots of T205s and T206s remaining - 10% off website-posted prices on all of those as well.

If anyone has any further interest in any of the cards I've offered here, be it T205, T206, M101-2, or these T206 Sovereigns, speak now.  

I'm opening my ebay store tomorrow, which means an automatic 13% loss to ebay and paypal fees.  Means I'm willing to bargain to a point where we both benefit.  Not 40-50%, Doug :), but within reason.

I'll check emails (t206themonster@gmail.com) at about 4:00 am Eastern - heading out now to do some 8-ball a-kicking.
